channel.title: Treasure Hunt
channel.description:
What is in the chest you say??? 24 Iron Ignots Iron Sword Diamond Sword 13 Pieces of Gold and a Clock
You first step is to at the spawn and look West for the highest hill you can see and make your way up, you will find a clue
BTW THE PASSWORD FOR THE CHEST IS "Treasure"

item.title: Treasure Hunt
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:8, topic:380796”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=476618.msg3485997#msg3485997 date=1296584474]

U like to copy reyx7 did one lol

implying he created the idea
I thought of it the day before he did one, and I’ve been on servers that contain no reyx7 that have treasure hunts.
When I quit the server soon ILL be making one with all of my shet.

The fuck? Why you gonna quit.
[/quote]He is saying what Tabby would be thinking according to him i guess…

Nope, I’m quitting soon.
inb4nerd, MC is technically ruining my life. I stay on until about 3AM, wake up at 6AM, and sleep in all of my classes.
This use to happen with me when I coded RSPS, I loved it so much that I would be on late coding shit, and when I woke up I was so tired I kept thinking about spawning shampoo, or a command to make it warmer.
Now my mind keeps telling me I can tele places. Srsly crazy.[/quote]
I see the world around me as blocks.

Read full topic
